ing: 1 (4 ounce) package IdahoanÂ® Scalloped Homestyle Casserole
des: "Scalloped Potatoes Gruyere is a new take on an old favorite. Simply use our Scalloped Homestyle Casserole potatoes, add chopped onions and shredded Gruyere cheese, and presto, you've got the perfect side dish for almost any meal."
ins:
Follow package directions and prepare potatoes.
Add chopped onions and bake.
Add shredded cheese 5 minutes before end of bake time.
